00099 #if RKH_TRACE == 1
00100     #if RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING == 1 && ( RKH_EN_STATE_NAME != 1 || RKH_EN_HSM_NAME != 1 )
00101     #error  "rkhcfg.h, When enabling RKH_TRACE and RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING is set to one (1), must be set to one (1) both RKH_EN_STATE_NAME or RKH_EN_HSM_NAME"

00105 #ifndef RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH
00106 #error "rkhcfg.h, Missing RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH: Max. # of hierarchical levels"
00107 #else
00108     #if RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH == 0 || RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH > 8
00109     #error  "rkhcfg.h, RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH must be > 0 and <= 8"
00110     #endif
00111 #endif

00124  *  The following macros and constants are internal to RKH and 
00125  *  the user application should not call it.

00128 #define RKH_REGULAR                     0x80
00129 #define RKH_PSEUDO                      0
00130 #define RKH_TYPE(t,i)                   (t|i)
00131 
00132 #define RKH_BASIC                       RKH_TYPE( RKH_REGULAR,  0    )
00133 #define RKH_COMPOSITE                   RKH_TYPE( RKH_REGULAR,  0x01 )  
00134 #define RKH_CONDITIONAL                 RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x02 )  
00135 #define RKH_JUNCTION                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x04 )  
00136 #define RKH_SHISTORY                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x08 )  
00137 #define RKH_DHISTORY                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x10 )

00144 #endif

00256 #if RKH_EN_ENT_HSM_ARG == 1
00257     
00258     typedef void ( *RKHENT_T )( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00259 
00260     #define rkh_exec_entry( s, h )              \
00261     {                                           \
00262         if( (s)->enter != NULL )                \
00263             (*(s)->enter)( h );                 \
00264     }
00265 
00266 #else
00267     
00268     typedef void ( *RKHENT_T )( void );
00269 
00270     #define rkh_exec_entry( s, h )              \
00271     {                                           \
00272         if( (s)->enter != NULL )                \
00273             (*(s)->enter)();                    \
00274     }
00275 
00276 #endif

00298             (*(s)->exit)( h );                  \

00300

00371 #if RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 1
00372 
00373     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00374     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( h, e )
00375 
00376 #elif RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 0
00377     
00378     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00379     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( e )
00380 
00381 #elif RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 0 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 1
00382     
00383     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00384     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( h )
00385 
00386 #else
00387     
00388     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( void );
00389     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))()
00390 
00391 #endif

00414 #if RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 1
00415 
00416     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00417     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( h, e )
00418     HUInt rkh_else( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00419 
00420 #elif RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 0
00421     
00422     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00423     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( e )
00424     HUInt rkh_else( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00425 
00426 
00427 #elif RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 0 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 1
00428     
00429     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00430     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( h )
00431     HUInt rkh_else( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00432 
00433 #else
00434     
00435     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( void );
00436     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)()
00437     HUInt rkh_else( void );
00438 
00439 #endif
